Title: The Equestranauts
Writer: Loren Bouchard (created by), Loren Bouchard (creator), Loren Bouchard (developed by), Jim Dauterive (developed by), Dan Mintz, Mike Benner (staff writer)
Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, Larry Murphy
Plot: In an homage to the "Bronies" subculture, Tina attends her first Equestra-con, a convention based on her favorite animated pony show, "The Equestranauts." To her surprise, she finds that ...
